sentence.text: Therefore, STX3 promotes the growth of breast cancer cells by regulating the PTEN-PI3K-positive regulation of protein phosphorylation-regulation of cell growth signaling

We find that STX3 promotes the proliferation of breast cancer cells by increasing the activation of the positive regulation of protein phosphorylation-mTOR signaling, and Akt inhibitor Ipatasertib or MK-2206 represses STX3 effects on the growth of breast cancer cells.
The up-regulation of positive regulation of cell proliferation is correlated with high disease stage and predicts overall and disease-free survival in patients with breast cancer.
